changelog: - Added yellow letters to regular key item icons to improve readability
- Fixed soul of a brave warriors at ruins/domain shortcut and at chaos door being swapped
- Fixed the following locations not showing up in a submap and not being checked after completing the location
- Depths -> Blighttown door opened
- Wanderer Set + Falchion
- soul of a brave warrior - ruins/domain shortcut
- Undead Burg Watchtower Upper opened
- Undead Burg Watchtower Lower opened
- Undead Burg Basement opened
- Fixed Witch set logic
- Fixed Depths to Blighttown door logic
- Cleaned up redundant, leftover code
- Added fog wall locations
- Added a settings tab
- Added hint tracking for real
- Added ref to all locations, removing redundant code
- Rewrote the logic
- Fixed issue where locations manually checked on full map would not be checked in submap
- Fixed crest key door location and logic
- Added extra icons to the royal wood and township maps
- Added new location to royal wood
- Added new layout options
- Added hint tracking
- Added DLC maps, locations, items, and logic
- Renamed instances of crystal caverns to crystal cave
- Renamed a check in painted world
- Added soul of a lost undead to the undead asylum submap
- Removed DA: Large Soul of a Brave Warrior - In Reah's Cell
- Removed BT: Butcher Knife
- Removed BT: Humanity - Maneater Mildred
- Removed PW: Notched Whip
- Added Priest Set
- Fixed red and green titanites swapped in chaos eater pit
- Fixed fire keeper soul logic in duke's archive
- Fixed crystal cave and seeth arena logic
- Fixed ua2 crest shield and peculiar doll logic
- Fixed residence key ID
- Removed snuggly trades to match apworld update
- Fixed four kings logic
- Added four kings node to new londo ruins map
- Fixed demon ruins shortcut logic
- Fixed orange charred ring tracking
- Fixed chaos door and domain shortcut brave souls being swapped
- Fixed snuggly trade item id copy pasta
- Fixed residence key logic
- Removed Havel's Ring
- Fixed caduceus round shield copy pasta
- Fixed souls of lost undead by aquaduct being swapped
- Fixed souls of proud knight by shadow set being swapped
- Fixed plank shield and twin humanities in lower blighttown being swapped (polygon map is wrong)
- Added the remaining maps.
Initial release
- Added maps up through Duke's Archives
- Fixed some logic bugs in undead burg and full map
Initial release
- Items: Tracking support for all progression items except snuggly's items
- Locations: Tracking support for all locations as of DSAP V0.0.8
- Logic: Location accessibility logic based on game state
- Autotracking: Support for automatic tracking of items, locations and settings when connected to an Archipelago server
- Autoupdates: Support for automatic updating of tracker pack when loaded
